title: Account got hacked
body:
Hi,

My account got hacked. I'm now lvl 1 and lost all my champions. What can I do ?

Thanks

replies.body: That's a bit strange to hear, even if you were hacked it's not possible to revert your content or account level.  It's possible that you might be logging onto the wrong account, though.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can help recover it with you.  See you there!

Ok thanks for the quick reply. I was also wandering how it's possible to remove my database from LoL EUW server. Maybe I log to the wrong account indeed. So by submitting a ticket there will be a way to find my "real" account ? Anyway I submit the ticket
